pageContext.claim: “As you know, they announced two weeks ago, record job numbers: almost 5 million people. And that beat the last month, which was also a record: 2.8 million people. Nobody's ever done what we've done, and now we're doing it twice.”
pageContext.analysis: The job growth for the majority of Trump’s first term continued trends that started under the Obama administration. While there was plenty to celebrate in the July jobs report, as jobs did come back faster than some anticipated, the economy has not recovered anywhere near as many jobs as it shed as a result of the coronavirus crisis.
